title: Gallauistöck
text:
The Gallauistöck is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Guttannen">Guttannen</a> in the <a href="Bernese%20Oberland">Bernese Oberland</a>. It lies north of the <a href="Ritzlihorn">Ritzlihorn</a> on the range separating the Urbachtal from the main <a href="Aar">Aar</a> valley.
On the south side of the mountain lies the <a href="Mattenalpsee">Mattenalpsee</a>.
